channel.title: The ZA Show Podcast
channel.description: Coming to you live and loud from Cape Town, South Africa
channel.itunes:subtitle: The ZA Show Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Coming to you live and loud from Cape Town, South Africa. We are your one stop for SA and Cape Town news, interviews with interesting people, soundseeing tours, music and a whole lot of fun. Subscribe right away!
channel.itunes:author: Glen and Bridgitte

item.title: ZA Show #094
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: We talk about public transport in South Africa and what options you have as a commuter. We discuss train, bus, cab and minibus taxis as the means of public transport. For all those motorists who are frustrated by minibus taxi drivers who drive badly on our roads, an online game called "Taxi Wars" will help curb that frustration. Check it out here Met and interviewed Jimmy Wales, who is the founder of Wikipedia at the Independent Armchair Theatre at the "Bring 'n Braai" event. Song - James Stewart - A Man Like Me (PMN) Semi final round of the cricket world cup is underway

item.title: ZA Show #093
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: We answer a question about Zimbabwe and Victoria Falls. If you want to know about Zimbabwe and life in Zim, go listen to the Paradise Lost Podcast I'm going to be talking at 27Dinner coming up on the 27th of April Thanks to Skyrove for the credits Come join us on Friday at the Independent Armchair Theatre for "Bring 'n Braai" which is an SA Free culture event Review on The River Siding in Ceres Huge dog food recall for SA dog food brands - Vets Choice and Royal Canin. UK working visas prices have gone up Song - Kelvin Declined - Funky Chicken (PMN) The City of Cape Town launched the Southern Line Tourism Route. I spoke to Theuns Vivian from the Tourism Department of the City of Cape Town about the route. SA through to the semi finals of the Cricket World Cup

item.title: ZA Show #091
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description:
We won Best SA Podcast at the 2007 SA Blog Awards. Thanks to Isobel, Nina and Sarah from 123 Listen To Me who accepted the award on our behalf. Check out the Blog awards Video iPodcast - The Showdown competition still on. Please vote for our shows?
New podcast just hit the podisphere. Woemf Potgooi. Technology podcast in Afrikaans. Go take a listen to what us tekkies are chatting about. We talk about township tours and why they have become a big tourist attraction in SA SA Manine and Coastal Management sold R8m boat for a song Polokwane starting 2010 stadium construction Soundseeing tour: Stormhoek Wine Estate. Graham Knox taking us on a tour of the estate Song: Eighteen Eighteen - Never (PMN) Cricket World Cup well underway

item.title: ZA Show #090
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: Where to buy biltong and other SA foods around the world including Australia Would like to thank Graham Knox for his hospitality at the Stormhoek Bloggers Braai. It was awesome! We would like to know who would want to come on a township tour with us. Last week I attended the sod turning ceremony for the Green Point 2010 stadium in Cape Town. Got to chat briefly with Mayor Helen Zille and Premier Ebrahim Rasool. Song: One Day Remains - Going Nowhere Slowly (PMN) Beyound the tour - Robben Island. Download the video Roland Schoeman got gold! Please vote for our shows in the ipodcast - The Showdown competition.

item.title: ZA Show #089
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: We finally have ADSL at home Culture Shock is a TV Show which is currently on TV. We talk about cultural differences we've noticed in the show. Durban beachfront pounded by huge waves and damaging businesses along the golden mile. Cape Town 2010 stadium budget and tender approved and awarded, but still there is another snake in the grass. Cape Town mayor Hellen Zille to run for DA leader Song: Abel Kraamsaal - Rooi Radar (PMN) Cricket World Cup. A huge loss in the cricket world with the passing of Bob Woolmer

item.title: ZA Show #088
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description:
Watch this video - Angels in the Dust Welcome to listeners from Chowder Radio
Vote for us for Best SA Podcast in the SA Blog Awards 2007 This past weekend was the Argus Cycle Tour. Feedback about the cycle tour as well as how it started. Follow-up: Fidentia - Arthor J Brown and Graham Maddock arrested The Cape Town city council on Thursday afternoon approved a R2,9-billion budget for its 2010 Soccer World Cup stadium at Green Point. Interview with Verity and also played a track - Wherever love goes (PMN) Go and buy her album. 2007 ICC Cricket World Cup is here

item.description:

F0 Tornado in Klerksdorp on Sunday. "Massive" 7.340kg baby born at Tygerbreg Hospital last Friday Fidentia, the big financial scandal that rocked the business world in SA - biggest financial mismanagement to date in SA Pick 'n Bay Argus cycle tour this coming Sunday

item.title: ZA Show #086
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description:
Part 2 of the interview with Riaan Manser, who circumnavigated Africa on a bicylce
If you are an expat in the UK or planning to travel and work in the UK, visit the RSA-UK website. A condom applicator has been selected as the most beautiful object in South Africa at the Design Indaba Expo. Guns n Roses are coming to SA Part 2 of the interview with Riaan Manser Song: Rob Reid - Russel the Mouse
"Lekota has been criticized for anti-expat sentiments. Opposition parties have accused Defence Minister Mosiuoa Lekota of being insensitive about crime.This after Lekota criticized South African expats for leaving the country because of crime.He told parliament that South Africa shouldn't care about what he's called unpatriotic individuals, who've turned their backs on the country."

item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: Welcome to the new year and we hope you have a fantastic 2007 We talk about the trip up to Port Edward and play a clip recorded on the road The movie Blood Diamond, which starts in SA on Friday, was shot in Port Edward and on the Wild Coast The last Capital 604 broadcast from the Wild Coast is now online Herschell Gibbs banned from two cricket tests due to 'rasist' slurs during first test against Pakistan SA surfers do us proud. Kwezi Qika is the first black surfer to win the SA junior championship Jordy Smith from Durban won the world junior surfing championships

item.title: ZATV #001 - How to make real South African biltong
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: It's FINALLY here in time for 2007. The first episode of ZA TV. Here is a 12min video podcast presented by Glen Verran on how to make your own South African biltong. The aim of this video is to make the process of making biltong as simple and easy to follow as possible. Believe me, the results are worth it. With many thanks to Jan Folmer for all his effort and hard work behind the camera, in post production and all the great ideas. Based on the box design and technique from Aris Stathakis at http://www.biltongbox.com Please comment and let me know what you think. Also let me know if you've made your own biltong too. The video is in Apple QuickTime format. (m4v).

item.itunes:summary:
It's FINALLY here in time for 2007. The first episode of ZA TV.
Here is a 12min video podcast presented by Glen Verran on how to make your own South African biltong. The aim of this video is to make the process of making biltong as simple and easy to follow as possible. Believe me, the results are worth it. :)
With many thanks to Jan Folmer for all his effort and hard work behind the camera, in post production and all the great ideas.
Based on the box design and technique from Aris Stathakis at http://www.biltongbox.com
Please comment and let me know what you think. Also let me know if you've made your own biltong too.
The video is in Apple QuickTime format. (m4v).

item.title: ZA Show #074
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: We welcome Jan Folmer as our guest on the show The "Make great SA biltong" video is nearly due for release Jan tells us about the 3 day Hoerikwaggo trail on Table Mountain that he went on. Great interview about South Africa with Carmin Arnot from Wildland Adventures on Travel with Rick Stevens Go listen in. Freshlyground wins MTV Music award in the African category Rickshaws are going to form a small part of the transport plan for Cape Town for the 2010 Soccer World Cup. These Rickshaws have been a popular tourist attraction in Durban for many years. item.title: ZA Show #054 - Did you get the right episode?
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: I got a comment from listerner Herc informing me that his copy if iTunes downloaded show #54 as The Daily Breakfest with Fr Roderick. He sent me video evidence indicating that this was the case. I would like to know if any of you received an invalid episode instead of #54 of The ZA Show. I am going to escalate this to Libsyn support. Edit: I got the following response from Libsyn and it was due to a problem on their side. Hi, I'm sorry to say that we did have a short spell (around an hour) where people may have been getting the wrong files. We addressed this issue as soon as we realized it was happening and had it fixed in short order. Sorry for the trouble, Marty A solution for this in iTunes is to delete show #54, click on the unsubscribe button to unsubscribe from the podcast, click on the subscribe button and the show will be downloaded. Please contect us if you need any help.

item.title: Feed was screwed
item.dc:creator: Glen and Bridgitte
item.description: Hi all ZA Show Listeners. The feed for the ZA Show got screwed up because the author of the show is specified as "Glen & Bridgitte" and for some reason, Libsyn didn't escape the "&" sign. For now, I've changed the author and removed the "&" and replaced it with "and". I'l lbe taking this up with Libsyn and iTunes will be updated as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvienance.
